śrīḥ
kumārī ādi paṃca āyatana devatānām tantraiḥ ca samalaṃkṛtaḥ
śiva hara rājadhānī rājabhiḥ
śrī rāja deva nandana siṃha bahādura narādhipaiḥ
saṃgṛhya viracitaḥ
mudrakaḥ evam prakāśakaḥ
adhyakṣa śrī veṃkaṭeśvara presa
khemarāja śrīkṛṣṇadāsa mārga boṃbaī
saṃskaraṇa san samvat
śrī gaṇeśāya namaḥ
atha śāktapramodaḥ
natvā kālīm kṛpā ārdrām kali kaluṣa harām komalām kānta dehām
kurvve śākta pramodam sukṛta sumati dam śobhanam sat janānām
śaktīnām sat saparyā ādikam iha gaditam tat samantrandaśānām
pañcānām devatānām api tad akhila kaṅkhaṇḍa nandurmmatīnām
atha śrī kālī dhyānam
śava ārūḍhām mahā bhīma aṅghora daṃṣṭrām hasat mukhīm
caturbhuja aṅkhaḍga muṇḍa vara abhaya karām śivām
muṇḍa mālā dharān devīm lalat jihvān digambarām
evam sañcintayet kālīm śmaśāna ālaya vāsinīm
atha yantra uddhāraḥ
ādau trikoṇam ālikhya trikoṇam tad bahis likhet
tatas vai vilikhet mantrī trikoṇa trayam uttamam
tatas trivṛt tam ālikhya likhet aṣṭadalam tatas
vṛttam vilikhya vidhivat likhet bhūpuram ekakam
atha mantra uddhāraḥ
kālī bīja trayam proktvā lajjā bīja dvayam tatas

iti paṭhitvā

original: devīpriyāyadhīmahi | tannaḥ paśuḥ pracodayāt ||' tataḥ khaḍgamprārthayet
analyzed: devī priyāya adhīmahi tat naḥ paśuḥ pracodayāt tatas khaḍgam prārthayet
oṃ asiḥ viśasanaḥ khaḍgaḥ tīkṣṇa dhāraḥ durāsadaḥ
śrī garbbhaḥ vijayaḥ ca eva dharmapāla namaḥ astu te
iti aṣṭau tava nāmāni svayam uktāni vedhasā
nakṣatram kṛttikā te tu guruḥ ddevaḥ maheśvaraḥ
rohiṇyaḥ ca śarīra ante dhātā devaḥ janārddanaḥ
pitā pitāmahaḥ devaḥ tvam mām pālaya sarvadā
nīla jīmūta saṅkāśaḥ tīkṣṇa daṃṣṭraḥ kṛśa udaraḥ
bhāva śuddhaḥ marṣaṇaḥ ca atitejāḥ tathā eva ca

original: iya/ yena dhṛtā kṣoṇī hataśca mahiṣāsuraḥ ||
analyzed: iya yena dhṛtā kṣoṇī hataḥ ca mahiṣa asuraḥ

original: tīkṣṇadhārāya śuddhāya tasmai khaḍgāya te namaḥ ||
analyzed: tīkṣṇa dhārāya śuddhāya tasmai khaḍgāya te namaḥ
caṇḍikā rasanā buddhyā eka ghāte tu ghātayet
paśu pāśāya vidmahe viprakarṇāya dhīmahi
tat naḥ chāgaḥ pracodayāt
sakalam devī agre kṛtvā sama bhāgena
saṃpūrṇam param aṅkaviḥ dīpayet māṃsa samīpa jan dīpam krauṃkraṃ

original: namonamaḥ' anena muṇḍe muṇḍe dīpandadyāttatastarppayedebhiḥ | pūrve '
analyzed: namaḥ namaḥ anena muṇḍe muṇḍe dīpan dadyāt tatas tarppayet ebhiḥ pūrve
cāmuṇḍān tarpayāmi namaḥ dakṣiṇe yoginīn tarpayāmi namaḥ
paścime ḍākinīn tarpayāmi namaḥ uttare bhairavīn tarpayāmi namaḥ
āgneyyām vidārikān tarpayāmi namaḥ nairṛte
pāpa rākṣasīn tarpayāmi namaḥ vāyavye pūtanān tarpayāmi namaḥ
īśāne kālikān tarpayāmi namaḥ
om adya daśa varṣa avicchinna śrī dakṣiṇa kālikā prīti kāma
imat chāga rudhiram sa muṇḍa vviṣṇu daivatam bhagavatyai
śrī dakṣiṇakālyai tubhyam aham sampradade iti chāga dāna vidhiḥ
tatas ārārttikam tat yathā kasmiṃścid svarṇa ādi bhājane
godhūma cūrṇa piṣṭe karpūra miśritāḥ ekādaśa śveta varttikāḥ prajvālya
dhūpa dāna vidhi ukta prakāreṇa prokṣaṇa ādikam kṛtvā ārārttikan dadyāt
ārārttika bhājanam phaṭ iti samprokṣya namaḥ iti abhyarccya yam
iti vāyubījena dvādaśa vāra japtena saṃśoṣya vāma hasta tale
ram iti bījena saṃdahya vāma hasta pṛṣṭhe
dakṣa hasta talat niveśya vam iti ṣoḍaśa vāra japtena
dhenu mudrayā amṛtīkṛtya mūlena aṣṭa śobhi mantrya
jaya dhvani mantra mātar svāhā iti ghaṇṭām sampūjya vāma tarjjanyā
saṃspṛśya mūlam paṭhan vahninā yojitam ca yat
ārārttikam idan divyam gṛhāṇa jagat īśvari mūlam ca paṭhan
idam ārārttikam sa aṅgāyai sa āyudhāyai sa bala vāhanāyai sa parivārāyai
sa āvaraṇāyai śrī dakṣiṇa kālikām pūjayāmi namaḥ iti paṭhan jalan datvā
netra pradeśe daśadhā bhrāmayet tatas puṣpa añjali trayeṇa
sa āyudha sa vāhana sa parivāra mahākāla sahita śrī dakṣiṇa kālikām pūjayā

original: minamaḥ' iti tri sampūjya tristappayet || tato
analyzed: iti tri sampūjya tris tappayet
yonimudrā ādikam pūrvavat darśayet tatas chatra cāmare darśayitvā
puṣpa añjalim gṛhītvā śloka catuṣṭayam paṭhet ślokāḥ yathā
buddhiḥ śarāsane kḷptā darpaṇam maṅgalāni ca
manaḥ vṛttiḥ vicitrā te nṛtya rūpeṇa kalpitā
dhvana yogī iti rūpeṇa śabda vādya prabhedataḥ

original: chatrāṇi tava padmāni kalpitāni mayā prabho || 2 ||
analyzed: chatrāṇi tava padmāni kalpitāni mayā prabho
suṣumnā dhvaja rūpeṇa prāṇāt yāvāśara ātmanā
ahaṅkāraḥ gaja tvena vegaḥ
iṃdriyāṇi aśva rūpāṇi
manaḥ pragraha rūpeṇa buddhiḥ sārathi rūpataḥ
sarvam anyat tava a kḷptam tava upakaraṇa ātmanā
iti puṣpa añjalin dadyāt prārtthayet iti

original: tato nityahomaṅkuryāt || tadyathā sthaṇḍile kuṇḍe vā mūlena
analyzed: tatas nitya homam kuryāt tat yathā sthaṇḍile kuṇḍe vā mūlena
vīkṣya astreṇa prokṣaṇa tāḍane kṛtvā kuśaiḥ ācchādya

original: vyāhṛtitrayamuccārya, vahnimānīya, tisro rekhāḥ sa/llikhya, astramantreṇa
analyzed: vyāhṛti trayam uccārya vahnim ānīya tisraḥ rekhāḥ sat likhya astramantreṇa
nairṛtye kravyāda aṃśam parityajya mūlena abhimantrya vam
iti dhenumudrayā amṛtīkṛtya astreṇa saṃrakṣya hūm iti avaguṇṭhya paritas
bhrāmayan tris praṇavam paṭhan
śayyā gatām ṛtusnātān nīla indīvara ghāriṇīn devena bhujyamānā

original: vāgīśvarīṅkuṇḍe dhyātvā tadyonimaṇḍale īśareto dhiyā vahniṃ
analyzed: vāgīśvarīṅkuṇḍe dhyātvā tad yoni maṇḍale īśa retaḥ dhiyā vahnim
hūm vahnicaitanyāya namaḥ iti paṭhan mūlam ca paṭhan sthāpayet
vahnim puṣpa akṣata ādinā sampūjya tatra iṣṭadevatām āvāhya sampūjya
ghṛta ādibhiḥ vyasta samastābhiḥ mahāvyāhṛtibhiḥ āhuti catuṣṭayan dattvā
sva kalpa ukta karavīra puṣpaiḥ ghṛta ādinā vā pañcaviṃśati saṅkhyayā
svāhā antam mūlamaṃtram uccārya tad ante caturthī antam devatā abhidhānam
svāhā antam uccārya juhuyāt punar vyāhṛtibhiḥ hutvā mūrttau devīn niyojya
saṃhāra mudrayā vahni visṛjya devyai ācamana ādikan dadyāt

original: cāmarādikaṃ sampradarśya stutvā, 'yāni kāni ca' ityādinā triḥ
analyzed: cāmara ādikam sampradarśya stutvā yāni kāni ca ityādinā tris
pradakṣiṇaṅkuryāt tatas daṇḍa vat praṇipatya
ācamana ādikam puṣpa añjalim ca vidhāya tatas brahmārpaṇa ākhyena manunā
ātmānam arpayet tat yathā arpaṇa mantraḥ tu om itas

original: manasā vācā hastābhyāmpadbhyāmudareṇa śiśnā yatsmṛta/ yyadukta/
analyzed: manasā vācā hastābhyām padbhyām udareṇa śiśnā yat smṛta yat ukta
yat kṛtam tat sarvam brahma arpaṇam bhavatu svāhā mām madīyam ca

original: sakalandevyai te samarpaye oṃtatsat' | tataḥ prāṇāyāmādika/ vvidhāya
analyzed: te samarpaye om tat sat tatas prāṇāyāma ādika vidhāya
puṣpa akṣata ādibhiḥ sampūjya kṣamāpayet kṣamāpana mantraḥ yathā
ajñānāt vismṛteḥ bhītyā āyan nyūnam adhikam kṛtam
viparītam ca tat sarvam kṣamasva parameśvari
mantra hīnam kriyā hīna vidhi hīnam sureśvari

original: sampūjitā mayā devi tasmāttva/ vvaradā bhava || 2 ||
analyzed: sampūjitā mayā devi tasmāt tva vvara dā bhava  /
āvāhanañca pūjām ca tvad māhātmyañca japan tathā
visarjjanat na janāmi kālike tvam kṣamasva me  /
yat akṣara pada bhraṣṭam svara vyañjana varjitam
tat sarvam kṣamyatām devi prasīda parameśvari
yasyāḥ smṛtyā ca nāma uktyā tapaḥ yajña kriyā ādiṣu
nyūnam sampūrṇa tā yāti prasīda parameśvari
gṛhāṇa arccām imām sarvām prasīda parameśvari

original: ityetaiḥ puṣpāñjalinā kṣamāpayet || tato yonimudrāmbaddhvā praṇamya
analyzed: iti etaiḥ puṣpa añjalinā kṣamāpayet tatas yonimudrām baddhvā praṇamya
om gaccha gaccha param sthānam sva sthānam parameśvari
pūjā ārādhana kāle ca punarāgamanāya ca iti
mūlamantram paṭhan saṃhāra mudrayā devī visṛjya sva hṛdaye sthāpayet
tata aiśānyān diśi hrīṃ caṇḍeśvaryai namaḥ iti caṇḍeśvarīm
sampūjya caṇḍeśvari mahādevi nirmālyaiḥ candana ādibhiḥ
lehya coṣya anna pāna ādi nirmālya sraj vilepanaiḥ
nirmālya bhojanan tubhyan dadāmi śrī śiva ājñayā iti mantreṇa
nirmālyan dadyāt tatas tatra eva ucchiṣṭacāṇḍālinīm sampūjya
tad ucchiṣṭa naivedya āsavam ucchiṣṭa cāṇḍālyai dadyāt
brāhmaṇān kumārīḥ ca sambhojya svayam prasādam bhuñjīta
puraścaraṇe tu aya viśeṣaḥ lakṣa saṃkhyāka japaḥ tad daśa aṃśaḥ
pūrva ukta dravyaiḥ puraścaraṇa paddhati ukta krameṇa pūrva ukta vidhinā
homaḥ karttavyaḥ tad daśa aṃśataḥ
karpūra miśrita toyaiḥ tīrtha toyaiḥ n madhunā vā mūlamantram uccārya
dakṣiṇakālīn tarpayāmi svāhā etat uccārya kiñcid pātre devatām

original: sampūjya tarpayet | punaḥ prāṇāyāmādi vidhāya visarjjayet |
analyzed: sampūjya tarpayet punar prāṇāyāma ādi vidhāya visarjjayet
tad daśa aṃśataḥ mārjayet tat yathā ātma ānanda devatā buddhyā dhyātvā
sampūjya mūlavidyām samuccārya tad ante
devatā abhidhān dvitīya antām uccārya tad ante abhiṣiñcāmi namaḥ
iti ātmānam abhiṣecayet tad daśa aṃśa brāhmaṇa bhojanam tad ante
mahatīm pūjām ca kuryāt
atha saṃkṣipta pūjā vidhiḥ
tatra sva vāme catur asra llikhitvā tatra om hraḥ sāmānya arghyam sthāpayāmi

original: itipuṣpākṣatānprakṣipya tatra 'oṃ ādhāraśaktibhyo namaḥ' iti sampūjya
analyzed: iti puṣpa akṣatān prakṣipya tatra om ādhāra śaktibhyaḥ namaḥ iti sampūjya
tatra arghapātram saṃsthāpya namaḥ iti jalena āpūrya tasmin jale
sūrya maṇḍalāt aṅkuśa mudrayā tīrthāni āvāhayet tatra mantraḥ
om gaṅge ca yamune ca eva godāvari sarasvati
narmade sindhu kāveri jale smin sannidhim kuru
om brahmāṇḍa udara tīrthāni karaiḥ spṛṣṭāni te rave

original: tena satyena me deva tīrthandehi divākara'
analyzed: tena satyena me deva tīrthan dehi divākara
iti tīrthāni āvāhya om gaṅgā ādi sakala tīrthebhyaḥ namaḥ
iti puṣpa akṣata ādibhiḥ sampūjya om arka maṇḍalāya dvādaśa kalā ātmane
namaḥ om vahni maṇḍalāya daśa kalā ātmane namaḥ om
soma maṇḍalāya ṣoḍaśa kalā ātmane namaḥ
iti arka vahni soma maṇḍala trayam sampūjya om ṣaḍaṅgebhyaḥ namaḥ
iti ṣaṣ aṅgāni sampūjya astre saṃrakṣya kavacena avaguṇṭhya vam
iti dhenu mudrayā amṛtīkṛtya matsya mudrayā ācchādya praṇavan daśa kṛtvas
japet śaṅkhamudrām sandarśya dhenumudrā yonimudre darśayet
iti sāmānya arghya sthāpana vidhiḥ atha pūjā
kuṅkuma keśara candana ādibhiḥ
ṣaṭkoṇa garbha trikoṇa traya aṣṭa bhūpura ātmaka llikhet tatas
ṛṣi ādi nyāsam kuryāt tat yathā śirasi bhairavāya ṛṣaye namaḥ mukhe

original: uṣṇikchandase namaḥ | hṛdaye oṃdakṣiṇakālikāyai namaḥ | guhye
analyzed: uṣṇih chandase namaḥ hṛdaye om dakṣiṇa kālikāyai namaḥ guhye

original: krīṃbījāya namaḥ | pādayoḥ hūṃśaktaye namaḥ | sarvāṅge
analyzed: krīṃ bījāya namaḥ pādayoḥ hūm śaktaye namaḥ sarva aṅge
krīṃ kīlakāya namaḥ atha ṣaḍaṅga nyāsaḥ krāṃ hṛdayāya namaḥ
iti aṅgulībhiḥ tarjjanī madhyamā nāma ābhiḥ prasāritābhiḥ hṛdayam spṛśet
krīṃ śirase svāhā iti tarjanī madhyamābhyām śiraḥ spṛśet
krūṃ śikhāya eva ṣaṭ iti baddha muṣṭinā aṅguṣṭhena śikhām spṛśet
iti mantreṇa vyasta hastābhyām sarva aṅge
kroṃ netratrayāya vauṣaṭ iti tarjjanyā anāmayā netre madhyamayā
bhrū madhyam eva netra trayam spṛśet
kraḥ astrāya phaṭ iti choṭikayā digvandhanam kuryāt
evam kara nyāsaḥ krāṃ aṅguṣṭha abhyānamaḥ
krīṃ tarjjanībhyām svāhā krūṃ madhyamābhyām vaṣaṭ kraiṃ
anāmikābhyām hūm krauṃ kaniṣṭhābhyām vauṣaṭ
kraḥ kara tala kara pṛṣṭhābhyām phaṭ eva nyāsa vidhāya daśadhā
saptadhā pañcadhā vyāpaka nyāsaṅkuryāt
tatas catur ṣoḍaśa aṣṭa vāra japtena mūlamantreṇa
pūraka kumbhaka recaka ākhyam prāṇāyāma trayam kuryāt
dakṣiṇa kālīn dhyāyet tatas āvāhayet tat yathā karakacchapikām
sa puṣpām baddhvā yathā ukta rūpān devīn dhyātvā
hṛdayāt nāsikā upari samānīya mūlam paṭhitvā ehi ehi mahādevi
iti añjali stha puṣpa upari samānīya om deveśi
bhakti sulabhe parivāra samanvite yāvat tvām pūjayiṣyāmi tāvat tvam

original: susthirā bhava' itiyantropari kṣipet || tato mūlamuccārya 'sāṅge sāyudhe
analyzed: susthirā bhava iti yantra upari kṣipet tatas mūlam uccārya sa aṅge sa āyudhe
sa vāhane sa āvaraṇe sa parivāre dakṣiṇakālike iha āgaccha
iti āvāhana mudrayā āvāhayet iha tiṣṭha iti sthāpana mudrayā sthāpayet
iha sannidhehi iti sannidhīkaraṇa mudrayā sannidhīkaraṇam
iha sannirudhyasva iti sannirodhana mudrayā sannirodhanam
iha sat mukhībhave iti sat mukhīkaraṇa mudrayā sammukhīkaraṇam astreṇa
saṃrakṣya hūm iti avaguṇṭhya vam iti dhenumudrayā amṛtīkṛtya
devatā aṅge ṣaṣ aṅgān vinyasya mūlamantreṇa sakalīkṛtya
ā hrīṃ kroṃ svāhā iti
devatāyāḥ prāṇa pratiṣṭhām kuryāt tat yathā
ā hrīṃ kroṃ śrīṃ dakṣiṇa kālikāyā
vāc manaḥ tvac cakṣuḥ śrotra ghrāṇa prāṇāḥ iha āgatya sukhañciran tiṣṭhantu

original: svāhā' iti hastandattvā paṭhet || tatra dhenumudrāmpradarśayet || tato
analyzed: svāhā iti hastan dattvā paṭhet tatra dhenumudrām pradarśayet

rivāra dakṣiṇa kālikā devatāyai namaḥ iti puṣpa añjali pañcakan dadyāt

original: evaṃ sarvatra mūlamantrapāṭhassāṅga ityādiyojanā ca bodhyā ||
analyzed: evam sarvatra mūlamantra pāṭhaḥ sa aṅgaḥ ityādi yojanā ca bodhyā
idam pādyam idam ācamanīyam
eṣa ṛghyaḥ eṣa madhuparkaḥ idam punarācamanīyam idam
snānīyan dakṣiṇa kālikā devatāyai namaḥ idam raktacandana anulepanam

original: 'ete akṣatā' 'imāni puṣpāṇi amukadevatāyaivauṣaṭ' eṣa dhūpaḥ eṣa
analyzed: ete akṣatāḥ imāni puṣpāṇi amuka devatāya eva oṣaṭ eṣa dhūpaḥ eṣa

original: dīpaḥ etāni naivedyāni kālikādevatāyainamaḥ ||' iti saṅkṣepataḥ pūjā/
analyzed: dīpaḥ etāni naivedyāni kālikā devatāyai namaḥ iti saṅkṣepataḥ pūjā

original: vvidhāya tato japamālāmānīya, kvacitpātre vāmahaste vā sthāpayitvā,
analyzed: vvidhāya tatas japa mālām ānīya kvacid pātre vāma haste vā sthāpayitvā

original: oṃ hrīṃsiddhyainamaḥ' ityanena mālāndakṣiṇakare nidhāya hṛtpradeśe
analyzed: om hrīṃ siddhyai namaḥ iti anena mālān dakṣiṇa kare nidhāya hṛd pradeśe

original: merumalaṅghayan śarīre kāmakalā/ vvibhāvya śirasi gurundhyātvā hṛdi
analyzed: merum alaṅghayan śarīre kāma kalāḥ vvibhāvya śirasi gurun dhyātvā hṛdi

original: jihvāmapi dīparūpiṇī/ vvibhāvya manasā upāṃśunā vā karamālayā

śirasi
om tvam māle sarva bhūtānām sarva loka priyā matā

original: śivaṅkuruṣva me bhadre yaśovīryañca sarvadā' itipaṭhannidhāya
analyzed: śivam kuruṣva me bhadre yaśaḥ vīryam ca sarva dā iti paṭhan nidhāya

om guhyā ati guhya goptrī tvam gṛhāṇa asmat kṛtañjapam

original: itimantreṇa devyā vāmakare tejomayañjalaṃ dhyātvā, samarpayet | tato

om tvammāle sarva devānām sarva siddhi pradā matā

original: tena satyena me siddhindehi devi namo'stu te |'
analyzed: tena satyena me siddhin dehi devi namaḥ astu te

śaktyā ālabhan paṭhet stotram kālī rūpaḥ dina trayāt
dakṣiṇākālikā tasya gehe tiṣṭhati na anyathā
veśyā latā gṛhe gatvā tasyāḥ cumbana tatparaḥ
tasyāḥ yonau tad rasa vvilihat japet
tad ante nāma sāhasram paṭhet bhakti parāyaṇaḥ
kālikā darśanam tasya bhavet eva tri yāmataḥ
nṛtya pātra gṛhe gatvā makāra pañcaka anvitaḥ
prasūna mañce saṃsthāpya śakti nyāsa parāyaṇaḥ
pātrāṇām sādhanam kṛtvā digvastra antām samācaret
sambhāvya cakran tat mūle tatra sa āvaraṇān japet
śatambhāle śataṅkeśe śatam sindūramaṇḍale
śata trayam kuca dvandve śata nābhau maheśvari

original: śata/ yyonau maheśāni sa/yyoge ca śatatrayam |
analyzed: śata yyonau maheśāni sayyoge ca śatatrayam

om hrīṃ padmau ati pad antatas trailokya nāma ca

om   svapna vārāhi kali svapne kathaya uccaret

original: sauḥastrāyaphaṭnama ititripadīṃ sampūjya maṇḍale sthāpayitvā pūjayet |

ūrddhvam pātu mahā lakṣmīḥ pātāle śāradā avatu

original: dhūmā kalāvatī pūrṇā bhāsurā sumatī rasā || 51 ||
analyzed: dhūmā kalāvatī pūrṇā bhāsurā sumatiḥ rasā

original: kāṣṭhā niṣṭhā pratiṣṭhā ca jyeṣṭhā śreṣṭhā jayāvahā |
analyzed: kāṣṭhā niṣṭhā pratiṣṭhā ca jyeṣṭhā śreṣṭhā jaya āvahā

aneka kula sampannān nānā jāti samudbhavām

bāla bhairava devasya kāminī vadakasya ca
mad putrasya sarva loka pūjitasya mahā ojasaḥ
pūjābhiḥ vividhaiḥ dravyaiḥ kumārī deva pūjitā
kumārī devatā proktā sarvatas jagat īśvarī
pūjā artha sarva lokasya samānīya sureśvarīm
pūjayantīm mahādevīm gupta bhāva nivāsinīm
sadā bhojana vāñchā āḍhyā mānyā santuṣṭa hāsinī

original: vṛthā na rauti sā devī kumārī devanāyikā ||
analyzed: vṛthā na rauti sā devī kumārī deva nāyikā
sarasvatī svarūpā sā pūjyate sarva nāyakaiḥ
śiva bhaktaiḥ viṣṇu bhaktaiḥ tathā anya deva pūjitaiḥ
sarva lokaiḥ pūjitā sā ca avaśyam pūjyate budhaiḥ
pūjayā labhate putrān pūjayā labhate śriyam
pūjayā dhanam āpnoti pūjayā labhate mahīm
pūjayā labhate lakṣmīm sarasvatīm mahā ojasam

original: mahāvidyāḥ prasīdanti sarve devā na saṃśayaḥ |
analyzed: mahā vidyāḥ prasīdanti sarve devāḥ na saṃśayaḥ
kāla bhairava brahma indra brāhmaṇāḥ brahma vedinaḥ
rudraḥ ca deva vargāḥ ca vaiṣṇavāḥ brahma rūpiṇaḥ
avatārāḥ ca dvi bhujāḥ vaiṣṇavāḥ manu śobhitāḥ
anye dikpāla devāḥ ca carācara guruḥ tathā
nānā vidyā āśritāḥ sarve dānavāḥ kūṭa śālinaḥ

original: upasargasthitā ye ye te te tuṣṭā na saṃśayaḥ |
analyzed: upasarga sthitāḥ ye ye te te tuṣṭāḥ na saṃśayaḥ

original: yadyahaṃ śuddharūpā hi anyaloke ca kā kathā ||
analyzed: yadi aham śuddha rūpā hi anya loke ca kā kathā
kumārī pūjanam kṛtvā
mahā kāntiḥ bhavet kṣipram sarva puṇya phala pradam
mahā bhaya ati durbbhikṣa ādi utpātāni kuleśvarī
duḥsvapna bhaya mṛtyuṃ ca ye ca anye ca samudbhavāḥ

original: kumārīpūjanādeva na te ca prabhavanti hi |
analyzed: kumārī pūjanāt eva na te ca prabhavanti hi
nityam krameṇa deveśi pūjayet vidhi pūrvakam
ghnanti vighnān pūjitāḥ ca bhayam śatrūn mahā utkaṭān
grahāḥ rogāḥ kṣaya bhūta vetāla pannagāḥ
rudrayāmale yathā
tad tad mantre samullekhyāt kṣaṇāt puṇya ayuta llabhet
mantreṇa japtvā siddhīśvaraḥ bhavet
yat yat prakāram uddiśya vadāmi surasundari
tat tat kāryam avaśyam ca kārayet
tathā
śṛṇu nātha kula arttham me kumārī pūjane manum
mahāvidyā mahāmantram siddhimantran na saṃśayaḥ
etad mantra prabhāveṇa jīvanmuktaḥ bhavet sudhīḥ
atidevi pada satyam ānanda bhairava
aihike sukha sampattiḥ madhumatyāḥ prasādataḥ
avaśyam prāpnuyāt marttyaḥ viśrāmam kuru śaṅkara
vāc bhavena vapuḥ kṣobham māyā bīje guṇa aṣṭakam
śriyaḥ bīje śriyaḥ lābhaḥ māyā bīje ripu kṣayaḥ
bhairaveṇa tu bījena khecara tvam sura ādibhiḥ

original: kumārikā hyahannātha sadā tvaṃ hi kumārakaḥ ||
analyzed: kumārikā hi ahan nātha sadā tvam hi kumārakaḥ
śatam aṣṭa uttarāḥ vvā api ekā vvā paripūjayet
pūjitāḥ paripūjyante hi avaghnanti avamānitāḥ
kumārī yoginī sākṣāt kumārī para devatā

original: asurā duṣṭanāgāśca ye ye duṣṭagrahā api ||
analyzed: asurāḥ duṣṭa nāgāḥ ca ye ye duṣṭa grahāḥ api
bhūta vetāla gandharvāḥ ḍākinī yakṣa rākṣasāḥ
yāḥ ca anyāḥ devatāḥ sarvāḥ bhūḥ bhuvaḥ svar ca bhairavāḥ
pṛthivī ādīni sarvāṇi brahmāṇḍe sacarācaram
brahmā viṣṇuḥ ca rudraḥ ca īśvaraḥ ca sadāśivaḥ
santuṣṭāḥ sarva tuṣṭāḥ ca yaḥ tu kanyām prapūjayet
vidhi yuktām kumārīn tu bhojayet ca eva bhairava
pādya ārgghyam ca tathā dhūpam kuṅkumam candanam śubham
bhakti bhāvena sampūjya kumārībhyaḥ nivedayet
ānīya sundarīn nārīn kumārī vvara nāyikām
ratna alaṅkāra sayyuktām śaṅkha vastra ādi śobhitām
vāc bhavena jalannātha tad nāmnā paridāpayet
devī buddhyā sadā dhyātvā pūjayet sādhaka uttamaḥ
māyā bījena tad nāmnā pādyan dadyāt tathā prabho
lakṣmī bījena kūrcca jena ca candanam
māyā bījena puṣpāṇi kumāryai dāpayet sudhīḥ
sadāśivena mantreṇa dhūpa dīpau mahattamau
dattvā ṣaḍaṅga mantreṇa pūjayet deva nāyaka
tad prakāram mahādeva śṛṇuṣva ānanda rūpadhṛk
mahā tejaḥ mayam śubhram hṛdayam hasta dakṣiṇaiḥ
vibhāvya prapaṭhet bhaktyā tat mantram śṛṇu śaṅkara
ādau vāc bhavam uccārya māyāḥ llakṣmīn ca kūrccakam
kula śabdam samuccārya kumārike tatas vadet

original: hṛdayāya namaḥ procya tataḥ śirasi bhāvayet ||
analyzed: hṛdayāya namaḥ procya tatas śirasi bhāvayet
śukla varṇam sarva mayam bījam uccārya san nyaset
hakāra vakāra vvāc bhava ādyam ca vakāra vvāc bhava ātmakam

original: māyā/ llakṣmī/ vvāgbhavañca dviṭhāntaṃ śirase padam |
analyzed: māyā llakṣmī vvāc bhavat ca dviṭha antam śirase padam
vahnijāyā avadhiḥ mantraḥ nyaset śirasi sādhakaḥ
śikhā madhye kṛṣṇa varṇat nīlāñjana caya prabham
vibhāvya san nyaset mantrī kumārī kula siddhaye
ādau praṇavam uddhṛtya tad aṃte viṣṇusundarīm
śikhāyai padam uddhṛtya vaṣaṭkāram tatas vadet
tatas kavaca madhye ca balavantam su tejasam
prathama aruṇa saṅkāśan dhyātvā cāru kalevaram
vāc bhavan ca samuccārya kula śabdan tatas vadet
vāgīśvari padam paścāt kavacāya tatas vadet
tārakam brahma śabdam ca kavaca nyāsa jālakam
tatas netra traye dhyātvā mahābījam mahā prabham
rakta varṇam koṭi koṭi javā maṇḍala maṇḍitam
tejasi bhāskare
vāc bhavam hi samuccārya kuleśvari padantataḥ
netratrayāya śabda ante vauṣaṭ locana mantrakam
tatas sādhaka mantrī ca vāma hasta tale tathā
madhyamā tarjjanībhyām ca tāla dvayam upācaret
tat mantram koṭi sūrya ugra jyotsnā jāla sama prabham
mahā ākāśa udbhavam śabda mahā ugra paripīḍanam
māyā bījam tathā astra āya padam uddhṛtya yatnataḥ
phaṭ ante ca antam uddhṛtya mahā mantram prakīrtitam

original: p. 391) tatastasyāḥ kuṇḍabile dhyātvā ca parivārakām |
analyzed: tatas tasyāḥ kuṇḍa bile dhyātvā ca parivārakām
pūjayet yatnatas mantrī tejasā amṛta dhārayā
tarpayet pūjayet bhaktyā bhairavam bālabhairavam
devatābhiḥ pūjayitvā parivārān krameṇa tu
tatas vāc bhavam uccārya siddha jayāya śabdataḥ
pūrvampadam samuccārya īritam
tatas vāc bhavam uccārya jayāya śabdam uddharet
uttare vaktram uddhṛtya caturthī antam namaḥ padam
tatas vāc bhava māyā śrī bījam uccārya yatnataḥ

original: kubjike paścimānte ca vaktrāya nama īritām ||
analyzed: kubjike paścima ante ca vaktrāya namaḥ īritām
tatas vāc bhavam uccārya kālike padam uccaret
dakṣa vaktrāya śabda ante namaḥ mantram prakīrtitam
etad mantra akṣarān nātha samuccārya kula īśvara
pūjayitvā krameṇa eva bhāskaram paripūjayet
sandhyā ādīn paripūjayet
vīrabhadrām mahā kanyām kaulinīm kula gāminīm
aṣṭādaśa bhujām kālīn caṇḍadurgām prapūjayet
naivedya ādīn samānīya nānā bhaktyā anurājitam
dugdham ghana āvṛtam kṣīram pakva annam pakva samphalam
yat yat kāla upayogyam ca sarvadā madhu miśritam
nānā dravyam ca naivedyam sva svalpa ukta sādhitam
kumārībhyaḥ nivedya eva nānā saurabha śobhitam
śītalan jalam ānīya dadyāt tābhyaḥ mahā sudhīḥ
tatas hitam mahā mantram kumāryāḥ ca ati durllabham

original: atha vāgmī samūlañca japtvā siddhīśvaro bhavet ||
analyzed: atha vāgmī sa mūlañca japtvā siddhīśvaraḥ bhavet
samarpya prāṇa vāyūn āndhāraṇam kārayet svayam
aṣṭāṅga ādi pramāṇam ca kurvan stotram paṭhet namet
praṇāma mantraḥ api tatra eva
namāmi kula kāminīm parama bhāgya sandāyinīm kumāra rati cāturīm
sakala siddhim ānandinīm
pravāla guṭikā sraja rajata rāga vastra anvitām
hiraṇya tula bhūṣaṇa ambhuvana vāc kumārī imbhaje
iti mantreṇa sannamya tāriṇīm paripūjayet
śiva aṅgaṇa īśam sampūjya praṇamet sādhaka uttamaḥ
dakṣiṇāḥ vidhivat dattvā kumārībhyaḥ krameṇa tu
vivāhayet svayam kanyām brahmahatyā vinaśyati

original: p. 392) yo yaśca puṇyakāle tu kanyādānaṃ samāpayet |
analyzed: yaḥ yaḥ ca puṇya kāle tu kanyā dānam samāpayet
bhūmi mukti phalan tasya saubhāgyam sarva sampadaḥ
rudra loke vaset nityam trinetraḥ bhagavān haraḥ
tīrtha koṭi sahasrāṇi aśvamedha śatāni ca

original: tatphala/ llabhate martyo yastu kanyā/ vvivāhayet |
analyzed: tat phala llabhate martyaḥ yaḥ tu kanyāḥ vvivāhayet
vālukā sāgare jñeyāḥ tāvat abda sahasrakam
ekaikaṅkulam uddhṛtya rudra loke mahīyate
tad tad iṣṭadevatāyāḥ prītaye tuṣṭaye sudhīḥ
kanyā dānam samāhṛtya muktim āpnoti bhairava
tad tad dvitīyaka nyāyāḥ tad tad buddhyā ca sādhakaḥ
vibhāvya śiva rūpa tvam sampradānīya kanyake
pūrṇa rūpam śivan dhyātvā varam sarva aṅga sundaram
tejaḥ maya yyaśaḥ kāntam kālabhairava rūpiṇam
baṭukeśam mahādeva
bāla rūpān ca trailokya sundarī vvaravarṇinīm
nānā alaṅkāra namra aṅgīm bhadra vidyā prakāśinīm
cāru hāsyām mahā ānanda hṛdayām śubha dām śubhām
dhyātvā dvādaśa patra abje pūrṇa candra nibha ānanām
sampradānam samānīya tad tad mantreṇa dāpayet
atha kumārī mantra puraścaraṇam
aṣṭama paṭale
atha vakṣye mahādevyāḥ kumāryāḥ japa homakaḥ
lakṣa saṅkhyan japam kṛtvā māyā vā vāc bhavam manum
kālībīja vvāpi nātha athavā kāmabījakam
sadāśivena puṭitam bindu candra vibhūṣitam
athavā praṇavena api puṭitam tridaśeśvara
tad daśa aṃśena juhuyāt ghṛta aktaiḥ bilva patrakaiḥ
athavā śveta puṣpaiḥ ca kunda puṣpaiḥ mahā phalam
evam krameṇa juhuyāt karavīra prasūnakaiḥ
ghṛta aktaiḥ kevalaiḥ vā api candana agaru miśritaiḥ
haviṣya āśī divābhāge rātrau pūjā paraḥ bhavet
nija pūjām aśeṣaiḥ tu kula dravyaiḥ prapūjayet
ravi saṃkhyan japet tatra paramānanda rūpadhṛk
japa ante juhuyāt mantrī mad ukta dravya sayyutaiḥ

original: tataḥ prāṇātmaka/ vvāyuṃ śodhayitvā punaḥ punaḥ ||
analyzed: tatas prāṇa ātmaka vvāyum śodhayitvā punar punar
prāṇāyāma trayam kṛtvā ca aṣṭāṅgaiḥ praṇamet mudā
praṇāma samaye nāthaḥ idam stotram paṭhet yadi
kavacam ca tathā pāṭhī aṅkumārīṇām atha api vā
nija devyāḥ mahā stotram pīṭha aṅga aṅkavacan tatas
kumārīṇām ahan deva sahasran nāma sa aṣṭakam
paṭhitvā siddhim āpnoti na atra kāryā vicāraṇā
tad aśaktau nija devyāḥ sahasram nāma maṅgalam
aṣṭa uttaram paṭhet nātha siddhi ākāṅkṣī na saṃśayaḥ
tāsām stotran divyan nātha śṛṇu sarvatra maṅgalam
akasmāt siddhim āpnoti paṭhitvā sādhaka uttamaḥ
agre saṃsthāpya tāḥ sarvāḥ ratna koṭi su śītalāḥ
tatas stotram paṭhet dhīmān samāhita manāḥ vaśī
mahā divya ācāra rataḥ vīra bhāva ulbaṇaḥ api vā
evam krameṇa prapaṭhet bhakti bhāva parāyaṇaḥ
mahājñānī bhavet kṣipra vvāñchā siddhim avāpnuyāt
atha kumārī pūjā prayogaḥ
tatra eka varṣa avadhi ṣoḍaśa varṣa paryantam ajātapuṣpā kumārī sañjñā
tatra varṣa krameṇa nāmāni yathā

original: sandhyā sarasvatī tridhāmūrttiḥ kālikā subhagā umā ||
rudrāṇī bhairavī mahālakṣmīḥ pīṭhanāyikā kṣetrajñā ambikā

analyzed: pratipad ādi pañcadaśa śyanta vṛddhi krameṇa pūjanīyāḥ
kumārī tu sarva jātīyā eva pūjyā
praśastā naṭī kanyā kāpālikā kanyā rajaka kanyā nāpita kanyā
gopālaka kanyā brāhmaṇa kanyā śūdra kanyā vaidya kanyā vaṇij kanyā
cāṇḍāla kanyā suhṛd varga kanyāḥ
kumārīm āsane samupaveśya dhyāyet yathā
bāla rūpān ca trailokya sundarī vvaravarṇinīm
nānā alaṃkāra namra aṅgīm bhadra vidyā prakāśinīm
cāru hāsyām mahā ānanda hṛdayām śubha dām śubhām
evam dhyātvā ātma śirasi mānasa upacāreṇa sampūjya
punar dhyātvā kumārī aṅge da tvā idam āsanam aiṃ hrīṃ hū hsauḥ
sandhyāyai kumāryai namaḥ

original: p. 394) evampūrvabījānyuccārya sarasvatyai kumāryai nama ityādi
analyzed: evampūrva bījāni uccārya sarasvatyai kumāryai namaḥ ityādi
vatsara anukrameṇa caturthī antena nāmnā āsana ādibhiḥ
ṣoḍaśabhiḥ upacāraiḥ sampūjayet
etat jalam aim sandhyāyai namaḥ etat pādyam hrīṃ sandhyāyai namaḥ

original: etadābharaṇaṃ śrīṃsarasvatyai eṣa gandhaḥ hū/sandhyāyai namaḥ, etāni
analyzed: etat ābharaṇam śrīṃ sarasvatyai eṣa gandhaḥ hū sandhyāyai namaḥ etāni

original: puṣpāṇi hsaussandhyāyai namaḥ, eṣa dhūpaḥ aiṃ sandhyāyai namaḥ, eṣa
analyzed: puṣpāṇi hsaussandhyāyai namaḥ eṣa dhūpaḥ aim sandhyāyai namaḥ eṣa

original: dīpaḥ hrīṃ sandhyāyai etannaivedyam aiṃ hrīṃśrīṃhū/hsauḥ
analyzed: dīpaḥ hrīṃ sandhyāyai etat naivedyam aim hrīṃ śrīṃ hū sauḥ
sandhyāyai nivedayāmi khaḍga mālya kajjala kuṅkuma ādikam anena
namaḥ ntena mantreṇa deyam
sarvatra caturthī antam kumāryai iti viśeṣaṇam dātavyam
tatas ṣaḍaṅga pūjā

original: tatra kramastu kumāryā hṛdayandakṣiṇahastena dhṛtvā mahātejomayaṃ
analyzed: tatra kramaḥ tu kumāryāḥ hṛdayam dakṣiṇa hastena dhṛtvā mahā tejaḥ mayam
śukla varṇam vibhāvya aim hrīṃ hū hsauḥ kulakumārike hṛdayāya
namaḥ śiraḥ śukla varṇam sarva maya vvibhāvya
haiṃ hrīṃ śrīṃ aiṃ śirase svāhā śikhān nīlāñjana prabhāḥ vvibhāvya

original: oṃ śrīṃ śikhāyai vaṣaṭ kavacamprathamāruṇasaṅkāśaṃ sutejaska/
analyzed: om śrīṃ śikhāyai vaṣaṭ kavacam prathama aruṇa saṅkāśam su tejaska
vvibhāvya aiṃ kulavāgīśvari tatas netra trayam
sarva bīja mayam mahā prabham rakta varṇam koṭi javāpuṣpa ujjvala vibhāvya
aim kula īśvarī netratrayāya vauṣaṭ hrīṃ astrāya phaṭ iti vāma hasta tale
tarjjanī madhyamābhyām tāla dvayan dadyāt
tatas tasyāḥ kuṇḍa bile sa parivāram bāla bhairavam dhyātvā ete gandha puṣpe

original: saparivārabālabhairavāya nama iti pūjayet ete gandhapuṣpe
analyzed: sa parivāra bāla bhairavāya namaḥ iti pūjayet ete gandha puṣpe
aim siddha jayāya pūrva vaktrāya namaḥ
aiṃ hrīṃ śrīṃ kubjike aiṃkālike dakṣiṇa vaktrāya
om bhāskarāya pratyekam dikpālebhyaḥ bīrabhadrāyai mahā kanyāyai
kaulinyai kula gāminyai aṣṭādaśa bhujāyai kālyai caṇḍa durgāyai
oṅkāra ādi namaḥ ntena pūjayet

original: tataḥ kumārīmūlamantraṃ svīyamantra/ vvā yathāśakti japtvā
analyzed: tatas kumārī mūlamantram svīya mantra vvā yathāśakti japtvā
prāṇāyāmam kṛtvā japam samarpya stava kavaca ādikam paṭhitvā
aṣṭāṅgam pañcāṅga vvā praṇamya dakṣiṇān dadyāt
iti kumārī pūjā prayogaḥ
atha kumārī tarpaṇam
śṛṇu nātha pravakṣyāmi kumārī tarpaṇa ādikam
kula bālām mūla padma sthitām kāma vihāriṇīm
śatadhā mūlamantreṇa tarpayāmi tava priye  /
mūlapaṅkaja yoga aṅgī kumārī śrī sarasvatīm
tarpayāmi kula dravyaiḥ tava santoṣa hetunā
śrī bījena tarpayāmi bhoga mokṣāya kevalam
kālikān nija bījena tarpayāmi kula amṛtaiḥ
svādhiṣṭhāna ākhya padma sthām mahā tejaḥ mayīm śivām
sūryāṇām śīrṣam adhunā tarpayāmi kuleśvarīm
maṇipūra abja madhyeṣu manohara kalevarām
umām devīn tarpayāmi māyā bījena pārvatīm
maṇipūra ambhoja madhye trailokya para pūjitām
māninīm mala cittasya sat buddhiḥ tarpayāmi aham
maṇipūra sthitām raudrīm parama ānanda varddhinīm
ākāśa gāminīn devīm kubjikān tarpayāmi aham
tarpayāmi mahādevīm mantra sādhana tatparām
yoginīm kāla sandarbhān tarpayāmi kula ānanām
śakti mantra pradām raudrīm llola jihvā samākulām
aparājitām mahādevīn tarpayāmi kuleśvarīm
mahā kaula priyām siddhām rudra loka sukha pradām
rudrāṇīm rudra kiraṇān tarpayāmi madhu priyām
ṣoḍaśa svara saṃsiddhim mahāraurava nāśinīm
mahā madya pān acittām bhairavīn tarpayāmi aham
trailokya vara dān devīm śrī bīja mālayā āvṛtām
mahā lakṣmīm bhava aiśvaryān tarpayāmi aham ambike
lokānām hita kartrīm ca hita ahita jana priyām
tarpayāmi ramā bīja pīṭha ādyām pīṭhanāyikām
jayantīm vveda vedāṅga mātaram sūrya mātaram

atha dīpam
ājya akta vartti sayyukta vvahninā dīpitantu yat
dīpam gṛhāṇa devaśa trailokya timira apahaḥ iti dīpam
atha naivedyam

original: apūpāni ca pakvāni maṇḍakā vaṭakāni ca |
analyzed: apūpāni ca pakvāni maṇḍakāḥ vaṭakāni ca
pāyasam sūpam annam ca naivedyam pratigṛhyatām iti naivedyam
atha ācamanīyam
pānīyam śītalam

original: gṛhāṇa pārvatīnātha tava prītyā prakalpitam || ityācamanīyam ||
analyzed: gṛhāṇa pārvatī nātha tava prītyā prakalpitam iti ācamanīyam
atha kara udvarttanam
karpūra ādīni dravyāṇi sugandhīni maheśvara
gṛhāṇa jagatān nātha kara udvarttana hetave iti kara udvarttanam
atha phalāni
kūṣmāṇḍam mātuliṅgam ca nārikela phalāni ca

original: gṛhāṇa pārvatīkānta somaśekhara śaṅkara | iti phalāni ||
analyzed: gṛhāṇa pārvatī kānta somaśekhara śaṅkara iti phalāni
atha spūgī phala tāmbūla ādīni
pūgī phalam mahat divyat nāgavallī dalaiḥ yutam

original: gṛhāṇa devadeveśa drākṣādīni sureśvara || iti pūgīphalādīni ||
analyzed: gṛhāṇa devadeveśa drākṣā ādīni sureśvara iti pūgī phala ādīni
atha dravyam
hiraṇyagarbha garbha stham hema bīja samanvitam
pañcaratnam mayā dattam gṛhyatām vṛṣabhadhvajaḥ iti dravyam
atha nīrājanam
agniḥ jyotiḥ raviḥ jyotiḥ jyotiḥ nārāyaṇaḥ vibhuḥ
nīrājayāmi deveśam pañca dīpaiḥ sureśvaraḥ iti nīrājanam
atha puṣpa añjaliḥ
hara viśva akhila ādhāra nirādhāra nirāśraya

original: puṣpāñjaliṅgṛhāṇeśa someśvara namo'stu te || iti puṣpāñjalim ||
analyzed: puṣpa añjalim gṛhāṇa īśa soma īśvara namaḥ astu te iti puṣpa añjalim
atha praṇāma mantraḥ
hetave jagatām eva saṃsāra arṇava setave
prabhave sarva vidyānām śambhave gurave namaḥ
iti praṇāma mantraḥ
sarva mantra ante sa aṅgāya sa āyudhāya sa vāhanāya sa parivārāya
sa āvaraṇāya namaḥ iti yojyam
atha śivasahasranāma āvalī
asya śrī sadāśiva sahasranāma stotra mantrasya nārāyaṇaḥ ṛṣiḥ

original: śrīsadāśivo devatā, anuṣṭupchandaḥ, sadāśivo bījam, gaurī śaktiḥ,
analyzed: śrī sadāśivaḥ devatā anuṣṭubh chandaḥ sadāśivaḥ bījam gaurī śaktiḥ
śrī sadāśiva prīti artham tad divya sahasranāmabhiḥ amuka dravya samarpaṇe
viniyogaḥ

iti śrīmat mahābhārate anuśāsanaparvaṇi dāna dharme saptadaśa adhyāye
śiva sahasranāma stotram sampūrṇam
śrī sāmba sadāśiva arpaṇam astu
atha argghya pradānam
adya pūrva uccaritaḥ evaṃguṇa viśeṣeṇa viśiṣṭāyām puṇya tithau
mama ātmanaḥ purāṇa ukta phala prāpti artham
pūjā sāṅga tā siddhi arttham argghya pradānam kariṣye
śiva rātri argghyāṇi
namaḥ śivāya śarvāya sarva pāpa harāya ca
śivarātrau mahā puṇyam gṛhāṇa argghyam namaḥ astu te
śivāya idam
vyomakeśa namaḥ tubhya vyoma ātman vyoma rūpiṇe
nakṣatra rūpiṇe tubhyan tāraka argghyat namaḥ ostu te
tārakāyanamaḥ idam  /
ākāśa ādiś śarīrāya graha nakṣatra māline
sura siddha nivāsāya dattam argghyam sadāśiva sadā idam
atha somavāra argghyāṇi
somavāravrataṅkarttuḥ kalyāṇam mama sarvadā
prasīda pārvatī nātha sāyujyan dehi me prabho
bhavānī śaṅkarāya namaḥ idam
naktena somavāreṇa somanātha jagatpate
aneka koṭi saubhāgyam anantam kuru śaṅkara śaṅkarāya idam
ākāśa ādiś śarīrāya graha nakṣatra māline
sarva siddhi nivāsāya dattam argghyat namaḥ astu te sadāśivāḥ idam
anena argghya pradānena bhagavān śrī bhavānī śaṅkara mahārudraḥ
prīyatām
iti argghya pradānam
atha mahimnastotram
śrī gaṇeśāya namaḥ
mahimnaḥ parama viduṣaḥ yadi a sadṛśī
stutiḥ brahma ādīnām api tad avasannāḥ tvayi giraḥ

original: athāvācyaḥ sarvaḥ svamatipariṇāmāvadhi gṛṇanmamāpyeṣa stotre hara
analyzed: atha avācyaḥ sarvaḥ sva mati pariṇāma avadhi gṛṇan mama api eṣa stotre hara
nirapavādaḥ parikaraḥ
atītaḥ panthānaḥ tava ca mahimā vāc manasayoḥ a tad vyāvṛttyā
yat cakitam abhidhatte śrutiḥ api

original: sa kasya stotavyaḥ katividhaguṇaḥ kasya viṣayaḥ
analyzed: sa kasya stotavyaḥ katividha guṇaḥ kasya viṣayaḥ

original: pade tvarvācīne patati na manaḥ kasya na vacaḥ || 2 ||
analyzed: pade tu arvācīne patati na manaḥ kasya na vacaḥ  /
madhu sphītāḥ vācaḥ paramam amṛtat nirmitavataḥ tava
brahman ki vvāc api suraguroḥ vismaya padam
mama tu etāḥ vvāṇī iṅguṇa kathana puṇyena bhavataḥ
punāmi iti arthe smin pura mathana buddhiḥ vyavasitā
tava aiśvarya yyat tat jagat udaya rakṣā pralaya kṛt
guṇa bhinnāsu tanuṣu
abhavyānām asmin vara da ramaṇīyām aramaṇīm
vihantum vyākrośīm vidadhate iha eke jaḍa dhiyaḥ

original: kimīhaḥ kiṅkāyaḥ sa khalu kimupāyastribhuvanaṅkimādhāro dhātā sṛjati
analyzed: kimīhaḥ kiṅkāyaḥ sa khalu kimupāyaḥ tribhuvanam kimādhāraḥ dhātā sṛjati
kimupādānaḥ iti ca
atarkya aiśvarye tvayi anavasara duḥsthaḥ hatadhiyaḥ
kutarkaḥ yaṅkān cit mukharayati mohāya jagataḥ
a janmānaḥ lokāḥ kim avayavavantaḥ api
jagatām adhiṣṭhātā araṅkimbhava vidhiḥ an ādṛtya bhavati
anīśaḥ vā kuryāt bhuvana janane kaḥ parikaro
yatas mandāḥ tvām prati amara vara saṃśerate ime  /
trayī sāṅkhya yogaḥ vvaiṣṇavam iti
prabhinne prasthāne param idam adaḥ pathyam iti ca
rucīnāḥ vvaicitryāt ṛju kuṭila nānā patha juṣāt nṛṇām ekaḥ gamyaḥ tvam asi
payasām arṇavaḥ iva
mahā ukṣaḥ khaṭvāṅgam paraśuḥ ajinam bhasma phaṇinaḥ
kapālam ca iti iyat tava vara da tantra upakaraṇam
surāḥ tāntām ṛddhin dadhati tu bhavat bhrū praṇihitān na hi
sva ātma ārāma viṣaya mṛgatṛṣṇā bhramayati
dhruvam kaścid sarvam sakalam aparaḥ tu adhruvam idam paraḥ dhrauvya adhrauvye
jagati gadati vyasta viṣaye
samasta ipi etasmin pura mathana taiḥ vismitaḥ iva

original: stuvajjihvemi tvānna khalu nanu dhṛṣṭā mukharatā || 9 ||
analyzed: stuvat jihvā imi tvāt na khalu nanu dhṛṣṭā mukhara tā
tava aiśvarya yyatnāt yat upari viriñcaḥ hariḥ adhas
paricchettum yātau analam anala skandha vapuṣaḥ
tatas bhakti śraddhā bhara guru gṛṇadbhyā aṅgiriśa
yat svayam tasthe tābhyām tava kim anuvṛttiḥ na phalati
ayatnāt āpādya tribhuvanam a vaira vyatikaran da śāsyaḥ yad bāhūn abhṛta
raṇa kaṇḍū para vaśān
śiraḥ padma śreṇī racita caraṇa ambhoruha baleḥ
sthirāyāḥ tvad bhakteḥ tripura hara visphūrjjitam idam
amuṣya tvad sevā samadhigata sārambhuja
tvad adhivasatau vikramayataḥ
alabhyā pāta ālepi alasa calita aṅguṣṭha śirasi
pratiṣṭhā tvayi āsīt dhruvam upacitaḥ muhyati khalaḥ
yat ṛddhim sutrāmṇaḥ vara da parama uccais api satī
bāṇaḥ parijana vidheyaḥ tribhuvanaḥ
na tat citram tasmin varivasitari tvad caraṇayoḥ n
kasya api unnatyai bhavati śirasaḥ tvayi avanatiḥ
akāṇḍa brahmāṇḍa kṣaya cakita deva asura kṛpā
vidheyasya āsīt yaḥ trinayana viṣam saṃhṛtavataḥ

original: sa kalmāṣaḥ kaṇṭhe tava na kurute na śriyamaho
analyzed: sa kalmāṣaḥ kaṇṭhe tava na kurute na śriyam aho
vikāraḥ api ślāghyaḥ bhuvana bhaya bhaṅga vyasaninaḥ
asiddhārtthāḥ nā eva kvacid api sa deva asura nare
nivarttante nityan jagati jayinaḥ yasya viśikhāḥ
sa paśyan īśa tvām itara sura sādhāraṇam abhūt smaraḥ smarttavya ātmā nahi
vaśiṣu pathyaḥ paribhavaḥ
mahī pāda āghātāt vrajati sahasā saṃśaya padampada
vviṣṇoḥ bbhrāmyat bhuja parigha rugṇa graha gaṇam
muhur dyauḥ dausthya yyāti a nibhṛta jaṭā tāḍita taṭā
jagat rakṣāyai tvat naṭasi nanu vāmā eva vibhu tā

original: pravāho vārā/ yyaḥ pṛṣatalaghudṛṣṭaḥ śirasi te |
analyzed: pravāhaḥ vārā yyaḥ pṛṣata laghu dṛṣṭaḥ śirasi te
jagat dvīpa ākāran jaladhi valayan tena kṛtam iti anena eva unneyan dhṛta mahima
vapuḥ
rathaḥ kṣoṇī yantā śatadhṛtiḥ aga indraḥ dhanuḥ atho
rathāṅge candra arkau ratha caraṇa pāṇiḥ śaraḥ iti
didhakṣoḥ te koyat tripura tṛṇam āḍambara vidhiḥ vidheyaiḥ krīḍantyaḥ na khalu
paratantrāḥ prabhu dhiyaḥ
hariḥ te sāhasraṅkamala balim ādhāya padayoḥ yat eka ūne
tasmin nijam udaharat netra kamalam
gataḥ bhakti udrekaḥ pariṇatim asau cakra vapuṣā
trayāṇām rakṣāyai tripura hara jāgartti jagatām

original: p. 478) kratau supte jāgrattvamasi phalayoge kratumatāṅkvakarma
analyzed: kratau supte jāgrat tvam asi phala yoge kratumatām ku akarma
pradhvastam phalati puruṣa ārādhanam ṛte
atas tvām samprekṣye kratuṣu phala dāna pratibhuvam
śrutau śraddhām baddhvā dṛḍha parikaraḥ karmasu janaḥ
kriyā dakṣaḥ dakṣaḥ kratu patiḥ adhīśaḥ tanubhṛtām ṛṣīṇām ārttvijyam
saraṇada sadasyāḥ sura gaṇāḥ
kratu bhreśaḥ tvattaḥ kratu phala vidhāna vyasaninaḥ
dhruvaṅkarttuḥ śraddhā vidhuram abhicārāya hi makhāḥ
prajānāthan nātha prasabham abhikam rohit bhūtām
riramayiṣum ṛṣyasya vapuṣā
dhanuṣpāṇeḥ yātandivam api tyajati na
mṛgavyādha rabhasaḥ
sva lāvaṇya āśaṃsā dhṛta dhanuṣam ahnāya tṛṇa vat puras
pura mathana puṣpāyudham api
yadi traiṇandevī yama nirata deha ūrddhva ghaṭanāt avaiti tvām adhā vata vara da
mugdhāḥ yuvatayaḥ
śmaśāneṣu ākrīḍā smarahara piśācāḥ sahacarāḥ citā bhasma ālepaḥ
sraj api nṛ karoṭī parikaraḥ

original: p. 483) kalpāvasāne bhuvanāni dagdhvā sarvāṇi yo nṛtyati bhūrilīlaḥ |
analyzed: kalpa avasāne bhuvanāni dagdhvā sarvāṇi yaḥ nṛtyati bhūri līlaḥ
sa kālarudraḥ uvatu māndava agneḥ vā ati ādi bhīteḥ akhilāt ca tāpāt
pradīpta vidyut kanaka avabhāsaḥ vidyāvara abhīti kuṭhāra pāṇiḥ
caturmukhaḥ tatpuruṣaḥ trinetraḥ prācyām sthitam rakṣatu mām ajasram
kuṭhāra kheṭa aṅkuśa pāśa śūla kapāla ḍhakka akṣa guṇān dadhānaḥ
caturmukhaḥ nīla ruciḥ trinetraḥ pāyāt aghoraḥ diśi dakṣiṇasyām
tryakṣaḥ caturvaktraḥ uru prabhāvaḥ sadyodhijātaḥ vatu mām pratīcyām
vara akṣamālā abhaya ṭaṅka hastaḥ saroja kiñjalka samāna varṇaḥ
trilocanaḥ cāru caturmukhaḥ mām pāyāt udīcyān diśi vāmadevaḥ  /
veda abhaya iṣṭa aṅkuśa pāśa ṭaṅka kapāla ḍhakka akṣaka śūla pāṇiḥ
sita dyutiḥ pañca mukhaḥ vatāt mām īśānaḥ ūrddhvam parama prakāśaḥ
mūrddhānam avyāt mama candramauliḥ bhālam mama avyāt atha bhālanetraḥ

ṛṣabhaḥ uvāca
iti etat kavacam śaiva vvara da vyāhṛtam mayā

yaḥ sadā dhārayet marttyaḥ śaivaṅkavacam uttamam

original: na tasya jāyate kvāpi bhayaṃ śambhoranugrahāt || 31 ||

original: yo dhatte kavacaṃ śaivaṃ sa devairapi pūjyate || 33 ||

original: vedhā vidhātā sraṣṭā ca saṃharttā ca caturmukhaḥ || 108 ||

raṇa ājau api saṃsmṛtya

analyzed: anye ca ye paṭhiṣyanti pāṭhayiṣyanti nityaśas

original: teṣāṃ duḥkhanna svapne'pi jāyate nātra saṃśayaḥ || 148 ||
analyzed: teṣām svapne pi jāyate na atra saṃśayaḥ
rājñām ca saṅkaṭe prāpte śata vāram paṭhet yadi
sa aṅgam ca vidhi yuktam ca naraḥ
roga nāśa karañca etat vidyā nāyakam uttamam
yam uddiśya phala śreṣṭham paṭhiṣyanti narāḥ tu iha
labhante na atra sandehaḥ phalam satyam anuttamam
mama prātar samutthāya pūjāṅkṛtvā madīyakam

original: paṭhate matsamakṣa/ vai nityaṃ siddhirnna dūrataḥ |
analyzed: paṭhate mad samakṣa vai nityam siddhiḥ na dūratas
aihikām siddhim āsādya para loka samudbhavām
prāpnoti pāṭhakaḥ nityam mad prasādāt sureśvara
sāyujyām muktim āyāti na atra kāryā vicāraṇā
evam uktvā tadā viṣṇum śaṅkaraḥ prīta mānasaḥ

original: upaspṛśya karābhyāṃ hi uvāca śaṅkaraḥ punaḥ || 154 ||
analyzed: upaspṛśya karābhyām hi uvāca śaṅkaraḥ punar
vara dāḥ asmi suraśreṣṭha varān vṛṇu yathā īpsitān

original: bhaktyā vaśīkṛto nūnaṃ stavenānena te sadā || 155 ||
analyzed: bhaktyā vaśīkṛtaḥ nūnam stavena anena te sadā
iti uktaḥ devadevena devadevam praṇamya tam
yathā idānīm kṛpā deva kriyate ca api atas param
kāryā ca eva viśeṣeṇa kṛpālu tvāt tvayā prabho
tvayi bhaktiḥ mahādeva prasīda varam uttamam
na anyat icchāmi bhaktānām ārttiḥ nā eva bhavet prabho
tat śrutvā vacanam tasya dayāvān sutarām bhavaḥ

original: pasparśa ca tadā tasmai śraddhāṃ śītāṃśulakṣaṇaḥ |
analyzed: pasparśa ca tadā tasmai śraddhām śītāṃśu lakṣaṇaḥ
prāha tvā enam mahādevaḥ parama ānandam acyutam

original: p. 499) mayi bhaktiśca vandyaśca pūjyaścaiva surairapi |
analyzed: mayi bhaktiḥ ca vandyaḥ ca pūjyaḥ ca eva suraiḥ api
viśvambharaḥ tvadīya nāma pāpa haramparam
bhaviṣyati na sandehaḥ mad prasādāt sura uttama
iti uktvā antardadhe rudraḥ bhagavān nīlalohitaḥ
janārddanaḥ upi bhagavān vacanāt śaṅkarasya ca
prāpya cakram śubhan dhyānam stotram etat nirantaram
papāṭha adhyāpayāmāsa bhaktaiḥ tat upapāditam

original: anye'pi ye paṭhiṣyanti te vindantu tathā phalam || 163 ||
analyzed: anye api ye paṭhiṣyanti te vindantu tathā phalam
iti pṛṣṭam samāyātam śṛṇvatām pāpa hārakam

original: ataḥ parañca kiṃ śreṣṭhāḥ kathayāmi vacaḥ punaḥ || 164 ||
analyzed: atas param ca kim śreṣṭhāḥ kathayāmi vacaḥ punar
iti śiva sahasranāma stotram sampūrṇam
iti śāktapramode śivatantram samāptam
śrīḥ
bāhādura narādhipa saṃgṛhīta viracita
pañcadaśam
gaṇeśatantram
ukta rāja guru vaṃśya paṇḍita śrī raghu rāja dubejī dvārā
saṃśodhitam
tat etat
svakīye śrī veṃkaṭeśvara yantra ālaye
mudrayitvā prakāśitam
mumbaī
śrī gaṇeśāya namaḥ
atha śāktapramodaḥ
atha gaṇeśatantram
atha gaṇeśa dhyānam
nava ratna mayan dvīpam smaret ikṣu rasa ambudhau
tat vīci dhauta paryantam manda māruta sevitam
mandāra pārijāta ādi kalpavṛkṣa latā ākulam
udbhūta ratna chāyābhiḥ aruṇīkṛta bhū talam
udyat dinakara indubhyām udbhāsita diś antaram
tasya madhye pārijāta nava ratna mayam smaret
ṛtubhiḥ sevitam ṣaḍbhiḥ aniśam prīti varddhanaiḥ
tasya adhastāt mahā pīṭhe racite mātṛkā ambuje
ṣaṭkoṇa antar trikoṇa āḍhyam mahāgaṇapatim smaret
hasti indra ānanam inducūḍam aruṇa chāyan trinetram rasā
śliṣṭampriyayā sa padmakarayā sva aṅka sthayā santatam
ṅkañja ābhaiḥ sva viṣāṇa ratna kalaśau hastaiḥ vahantam bhaje  /
gaṇḍa pālī galat dāna pūra lālasa mānasān
dvirephān karṇa tālābhyām vvārayantam muhur muhur

ratna varṣaiḥ prīṇayantam sādhakam mada vihvalam

atha mantra uddhāraḥ
śrī śakti smara bhū vighna bījāni
ṅeḥ taṅ gaṇa patim paścāt vara ante vara dam param
uktvā vaśam ānaya
aṣṭāviṃśati akṣaraḥ yantāra ādyaḥ manuḥ īritaḥ
atha mantraḥ

original: oṃ śrīṃ hrīṃ klīṃ glauṃ gaṃgaṇapataye varavarada sarvajanamme
analyzed: om śrīṃ hrīṃ klīṃ glauṃ gaṃgaṇa pataye vara vara da
vaśam ānaya ṭhaḥ ṭhaḥ
atha pūjā prayogaḥ
prātar kṛtyā ādi pīṭhanyāsa anta vidhāya pūrva ukta pīṭha śaktīḥ vinyasya

original: tadyathā || keśareṣu madhye ca || tīvrāyai0 jvālinyai0 nandāyai0 bhogadāyai0
analyzed: tat yathā keśareṣu madhye ca tīvrāyai jvālinyai nandāyai bhogadāyai

original: kāmarūpiṇyai0 ugrāyai0 tejovatyai0 satyāyai0 vighnanāśinyai0 tadupari
analyzed: kāmarūpiṇyai ugrāyai tejovatyai satyāyai vighna nāśinyai tad upari

original: madhye sarvaśaktikamalāsanāya namaḥ || sarvatra praṇavādi namo'ntena
analyzed: madhye sarva śakti kamala āsanāya namaḥ sarvatra praṇava ādi namas ntena

original: pūjayet || tata ṛṣyādinyāsamācaret || śirasi gaṇakaṛṣayenamaḥ || mukhe
analyzed: pūjayet tatas ṛṣi ādi nyāsam ācaret śirasi gaṇaka ṛṣaye namaḥ mukhe
nicṛt gāyatrī chandase namaḥ hṛdi gaṇapataye devatāyai namaḥ tatas
kara aṅganyāsau om śrīṃ hrīṃ klīṃ glauṃ gaṃgāṃ
aṅguṣṭhābhyām namaḥ om śrīṃ hrīṃ klīṃ glauṃ gaṃgīṃ

anāmikābhyām hūm gauṃ kaniṣṭhābhyām vvaṣaṭ     gaḥ
kara tala kara pṛṣṭhābhyām phaṭ evam hṛdaya ādiṣu kecid tu om
gām hṛdayāya namaḥ śrīṃ gīṃ śirase svāhā iti tattva ṣaḍbīja stha sva bījena
dīrggha bhājā prakalpayet iti vacanāt viśiṣṭasya eva grahaṇāt
atha ṣoḍaśa upacāra krameṇa pūjā vidhiḥ
atha dhyānam
eka dantam śūrpa karṇam gaja vaktran catur bhujam
pāśa aṅkuśa dharan devam modakān vibhratam karaiḥ
rakta puṣpa mayīm mālām kaṇṭhe haste parām śubhām
bhaktānām vvara dam siddhi buddhibhyām sevitam sadā
siddhi buddhi pradam nṝṇām dharma arttha kāma mokṣa dam
brahma rudra hari indra ādyaiḥ saṃstutam parama ṛṣibhiḥ iti dhyānam
atha āvāhanam
āgaccha jagat ādhāra sura asura vara arccita
anātha nātha sarvajña gīrvāṇa paripūjitaḥ iti āvāhanam
atha āsanam
svarṇa siṃhāsanan divyan nānā ratna samanvitam

original: samarpitammayā deva tatra tvaṃ samupāviśa || ityāsanam ||
analyzed: samarpitam mayā deva tatra tvam samupāviśa iti āsanam
atha pādyam
devadeveśa sarva īśa sarva tīrttha āhṛtan jalam
pādyam gṛhāṇa gaṇapate gandha puṣpa akṣataiḥ yutam iti pādyam
atha ārgghyam
pravāla muktāphala pūga ratnan tāmbūla jāmbūnadam aṣṭa gandham
puṣpa akṣata āyuktam amogha śakte dattam mayā argghyam saphalīkuruṣva
iti argghyam
atha ācamanīyam
gaṅgā ādi sarva tīrtthebhyaḥ prārthitan toyam uttamam
karpūra elā lavaṅga ādi vāsitam svīkuru prabho iti ācamanīyam
campaka aśoka bakula mālatī mallikā ādibhiḥ
vāsitam snigdha tā hetun tailam cāru pragṛhyatām iti tailam
atha dugdha snānam
kāmadhenu samudbhūtam sarveṣām jīvanam param

original: pāvanaṃ yajñahetunte payaḥ snānārtthamarpitam ||| iti dugdhasnānam ||
analyzed: pāvanam yajña hetum te payaḥ snāna arttham arpitam iti dugdha snānam
atha dadhi snānam
dhenu dugdha samudbhūtam śuddham sarva gatam priyam
mayā ānītam dadhi varam snāna arttham pratigṛhyatām iti dadhi snānam
atha ghṛta snānam
yathā aṅgan devatā āhāram ghṛtam snātum samarppitam iti ghṛta snānam
atha madhusnānam
sarva puṣṭi karan deva madhu snāna arttham arpitam iti madhusnānam
atha śarkkarā snānam
ikṣu sāra samudbhūtām śarkkarām su manoharām
mala apahāriṇīm snātum gṛhāṇa tvam mayā arpitām iti śarkkarā snānam
atha guḍa snānam
sarva mādhurya tā hetuḥ svāduḥ sarva priyaṅkaraḥ
puṣṭi kṛt snātum ānītaḥ ikṣu sāra bhavaḥ guḍaḥ iti guḍa snānam
atha madhuparkkaḥ
kāṃsye kāṃsyena pihitaḥ dadhi madhu ājya pūritaḥ
madhuparkkaḥ mayā ānītaḥ pūjā arttham pratigṛhyatām iti madhuparkkaḥ
atha śuddha udaka snānam
sarva tīrttha āhṛta antaḥ yam mayā prārtthanayā vibho

original: suvāsitaṅgṛhāṇedaṃ samyak snātuṃ sureśvara || iti śuddhodakasnānam ||
analyzed: su vāsitam gṛhāṇa idam samyak snātum sureśvara iti śuddha udaka snānam
atha vastram
rakta vastra yugan deva loka lajjā nivāraṇam

atha upavītam
rājatam brahmasūtram ca kāñcanam
bhaktyā upapāditan deva gṛhāṇa parameśvara iti yajñopavītam
atha bhūṣaṇam
aneka ratna yuktāni bhūṣaṇāni bahūni ca

original: tattadaṅge kāñcanāni yojayāmi tavājñayā || iti bhūṣaṇāni ||
analyzed: tad tad aṅge kāñcanāni yojayāmi tava ājñayā iti bhūṣaṇāni
atha candanam
aṣṭa gandha samāyuktam raktacandanam uttamam

original: dvādaśāṅgeṣu te deva lepayāmi kṛpāṅkuru || iti candanam ||
analyzed: dvādaśa aṅgeṣu te deva lepayāmi kṛpāṅkuru iti candanam
atha akṣatāḥ
raktacandana saṃmiśrān tandulān tilaka upari
śobhāyai sampradāsyāmi gṛhāṇa parameśvara iti akṣatāḥ
atha puṣpāṇi
bandhūkam raktapaṅkajam
mogaram mālatī puṣpam gṛhāṇa su manoharam iti puṣpāṇi
atha dhūpaḥ
sarva pāpa kṣaya karantu aṅgṛhāṇa mayā arpitam iti dhūpaḥ
atha dīpaḥ
sarvajña sarva loka īśa tamaḥ nāśanam uttamam

original: gṛhāṇa maṅgalandīpandevadeva namo'stu te || iti dīpaḥ ||
analyzed: gṛhāṇa maṅgalan dīpan devadeva namaḥ astu te iti dīpaḥ
atha naivedyāni
nānā pakva anna sayyuktam pāyasam śarkarā anvitam

dadhi dugdha ghṛtaiḥ yuktam llavaṅga elā samanvitam
sampāditaiḥ su pakvaiḥ ca bharjjitaiḥ vaṭakaiḥ yutam
modaka apūpa laḍḍūka śaṣkulī maṇḍaka ādibhiḥ
parpaṭaiḥ api
haridrā hiṅgu lavaṇa sahitam sūpam uttamam
sa sāmudram gṛhāṇa idam bhojanam kuru sādaram iti naivedyāni
atha ācamanīyam
su tṛpti kārakan toyam su gandham ca piba icchayā
tvayi tṛpte jagattṛpta nitya tṛpte mahātmani
dadmi toyam su vāsitam
mukha pāṇi viśuddhi arttham punar toyan dadāmi te iti ācamanīyam
atha phalāni
drākṣā rambhā phalam pakvam karkandhūḥ khārjuram phalam
nārikelam ca nāriṅga mañjiran jambiran tathā

original: urvārukañca deveśa phalānyetāni gṛhyatām || iti phalāni ||
analyzed: urvārukam ca deveśa phalāni etāni gṛhyatām iti phalāni
atha sa ācamanīyaṅkara udvarttana ādikam
mukha pāṇi viśuddhi arttham punar toyan dadāmi te
gṛhāṇa candanam cāru kara aṅga udvarttanam śubham

original: sugandhināmakampuṇyaṃ gandhi cāru pragṛhyatām || iti karodvarttanam ||
analyzed: sugandhi nāmakam puṇyam gandhi cāru pragṛhyatām iti kara udvarttanam
atha sindūram
cāru śālūra sambhūta vvaṃśa sāra samudbhavam
llākṣā rañjitam astu te iti sindūram
atha tāmbūlam
elā lavaṅga saṃmiśran tāmbūlam kesara anvitam iti tāmbūlam
atha dravyam
nyūna atirikta apūjāyāḥ sampūrṇa phala hetave

atha mālā
sita pītaiḥ tathā raktaiḥ jala jaiḥ kusumaiḥ śubhaiḥ

atha dūrvāḥ
haritāḥ śveta varṇāḥ vā pañca tri patra sayyutāḥ

original: dūrvāṅkurā mayā dattā ekaviṃsatisammitāḥ || iti dūrvāḥ ||
analyzed: dūrvā aṅkurāḥ mayā dattāḥ ekaviṃsati sammitāḥ iti dūrvāḥ
atha pradakṣiṇā

original: pade pade te deveśa naśyantu pātakāni me || iti pradakṣiṇā ||
analyzed: pade pade te deveśa naśyantu pātakāni me iti pradakṣiṇā
atha ārārttikam
audumbare rājate vā kāṃsye kāñcana sambhave
pātre prakalpitān dīpān gṛhāṇa cakṣuḥ arpakān
pañca ārā ārttim pañca dīpaḥ dīpitām parameśvaraḥ

original: yathāsyanekṣyate bhasma tathā pāpa/ vvināśaya | ityārārttikam ||
analyzed: bhasma tathā pāpa vināśaya iti ārārttikam
iti pūjā vidhiḥ
atha gaṇeśa stava rājaḥ
om tatpuruṣāya vidmahe vakratuṇḍāya dhīmahi
tat naḥ dantiḥ pracodayāt
oṃkāram ādyam pravahanti santaḥ vācaḥ śrutīnām api yam gṛṇanti

pāda aravinda arccana tatparāṇām saṃsāra dāva anala bhaṅga dakṣam

līlābhiḥ ārāt śivam arccayan tam gajānanam bhakti yutāḥ bhajanti
kumāra bhuktau punar ātma hetoḥ payodharau parvatarāja putryāḥ
prakṣālayan tam kara śīkareṇa maugdhyena tat nāga mukham bhajāmi

original: tayā samuddhṛtya gajasya hasta/ yye śīkarāḥ puṣkararandhramuktāḥ |
analyzed: tayā samuddhṛtya gajasya hasta yye śīkarāḥ puṣkara randhra muktāḥ

original: vyomāṅgaṇe te vicaranti tārāḥ kālātmanā mauktikatulyabhāsaḥ ||
analyzed: vyoma aṅgaṇe te vicaranti tārāḥ kāla ātmanā mauktika tulya bhāsaḥ
krīḍā rate vārinidhau gaja sthe velām atikrāmati vāripūre
kalpa avasānam paricintya devāḥ kailāsa nātham śrutibhiḥ stuvanti
nāga ānane nāga kṛta uttarīye krīḍā rate deva kumāra saṅghaiḥ

original: tvayi kṣaṇaṅkālagatiṃ vvihāya tau prāpatuḥ kandukatāminendū ||
analyzed: tvayi kṣaṇaṅkāla gatim vvihāya tau prāpatuḥ kanduka tāminā indū

akāraṇam kāraṇam āpta vācāntan nāga vaktran na jahāti cetaḥ

original: nāgātmaka/ vvā puruṣātmaka/ vvā tvabhedamādyambhaja vighnarājam ||
analyzed: nāga ātmaka vvā puruṣa ātmaka vvā tu abhedam ādyam bhaja vighna rājam

muktāphala ābhaiḥ pṛthu śīkara oghaiḥ siñcantam aṅgam śivayoḥ bhajāmi
anekam ekam gajam eka dantam caitanya rūpam jagat ādi bījam

original: brahmeti ya/ vvedavido vadanti taṃ śaṃbhusūnuṃ satatambhajāmi ||

original: ye pūrvamārādhya gajānanantvāṃ sarvāṇi śāstrāṇi paṭhanti teṣām |
analyzed: ye pūrvam ārādhya gajānana tvām sarvāṇi śāstrāṇi paṭhanti teṣām
tvattaḥ na ca anyat pratipādyam etaiḥ tat asti ced sarvam asatya kalpam
hiraṇya varṇān jagadīśi tāraṅka vimpurāṇam ravi maṇḍala stham

vedānta gītam puruṣam bhaja iham ātmānam ānanda ghanam hṛdistham

śambhoḥ samālokya jaṭā kalāpe
su bhagna dantam pravicintya maugdhyāt ākraṣṭu kāmaḥ śriyam ātanotu

original: stutyā'nayā ye vidhivatstuvanti te sarvalakṣmīnilayā bhavanti ||
analyzed: stutyā anayā ye vidhivat stuvanti te sarva lakṣmī nilayāḥ bhavanti

atha kavacam
īśvaraḥ uvāca

candra bīja visarga āḍhyam pātu me guhya deśakam
akṣarā usau mahā mantraḥ sarva tantreṣu gopitaḥ

iti te kathitam divyam triṣu lokeṣu durllabham

tat tat sarvam bhavati eva kavacasya ca dhāraṇāt
bhūta preta piśācāḥ ca yakṣa gandharva rākṣasāḥ

dūrāt eva palāyante tasya saṅkīrttanāt api

ravivāre ca saṅkrāntyām saptamyām ca viśeṣataḥ

uta amṛta tvasya īśānaḥ yat annena atirohati

tasmāt yajñāt sarva hutaḥ sambhṛtam pṛṣadājyam

yat puruṣa vyadadhuḥ katidhā vyakalpayan

ūrū tat asya yat vaiśyaḥ padbhyā śūdraḥ ajāyata  /

original: ṣaṭvedāṅkendu (1946) yukte śaradi vidhudine sattithau ṣaṇmukhasya akṣe
analyzed: ṣaṣ vedāṅka indu yukte śaradi vidhu dine sat tithau ṣaṇmukhasya akṣe
pakṣe su māse jaya sukha śubha de mādhave mānavānām
granthaḥ śākta pramoda ugama dayam akhilaḥ sampradeśaḥ samāptim
śrī devaiḥ nandana antaiḥ nṛpa kula kamala ahaskaraiḥ su praṇītaḥ
iti granthasya viṣayāḥ samāptāḥ
